title: Barron Trump not attending classes in New York this fall, reports say
shortDescription: Barron Trump appears to be missing from NYU's New York campus this fall. Reports say he is doing a semester elsewhere. Here is what we know.

title: 'Here we go!' Trump reacts to Russian drones shot down over Poland
shortDescription: President Donald Trump reacted to Russian's drone incursion into Poland's airspace with a brief post on social media that said, "Here we go!"

title: 'Personally objectionable:' Anthony Bourdain video on Trump resurfaces
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ate at a Washington, DC, restaurant on Sept. 9. An old interview with Anthony Bourdain about Trump resurfaced online.

title: Trump's 30-day takeover of the DC police is ending. What's next?
shortDescription: Trump's 30-day public emergency declaration in Washington DC is set to expire after Sept. 10, but the National Guard will remain.

title: Oliver North marries ex-White House secretary Fawn Hall
shortDescription: Oliver North, the retired Marine Corps lieutenant colonel involved in the Iran-Contra scandal, married his former White House secretary, Fawn Hall.

title: Kamala Harris says 'recklessness' drove silence on Biden in 2024
shortDescription: In her memoir, “107 Days,” Harris explains why she deferred to Joe Biden on his reelection bid and rips his inner circle.

title: Trump comes face to face with protesters at local restaurant in D.C.
shortDescription: A group of protesters confronted Trump at a local restaurant in D.C., chanting “free Palestine” and calling Trump the “Hitler of our time.”

title: Judge keeps Lisa Cook at Fed as Trump appeals, urges lower interest
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily blocked Trump from firing Lisa Cook from the Fed as he pushes for lower interest rates. The Justice Department appealed.

title: Protesters confront Trump at DC restaurant
shortDescription: Protestors confront President Trump at DC restaurant calling him the 'Hitler of our time'.

title: Donald Trump condemns Israel's strike on Hamas leaders in Qatar
shortDescription: Donald Trump sharply condemned Israel’s bombing of Hamas leaders in Doha, saying the strike “does not advance Israel or America’s goals”.

title: How one major college president is navigating higher ed under Trump
shortDescription: In an interview with USA TODAY, the Ohio State University President Ted Carter says he doesn’t feel targeted by the federal government.

title: Trump to turn White House lawn into UFC cage match arena
shortDescription: Trump plans to host the first UFC fight at the White House as part of yearlong celebrations for the country's 250th anniversary.

title: US judge blocks Trump from removing Lisa Cook as Federal Reserve governor
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Jia Cobb's ruling does not settle the key issue of whether the Trump administration's claims that Cook committed mortgage fraud.

title: Democrat wins special election to fill Rep. Gerald Connolly's seat
shortDescription: Democrat James Walkinshaw won the Sept. 9 Virginia special election to fill late Rep. Gerald Connolly’s seat.

title: I'll have seafood, hold the crime: Trump dines in DC, says streets now safe
shortDescription: Trump visited a DC restaurant he didn't own for the first time as president to show the city was safer with his police takeover and National Guard.

title: Trump to crack down on pharma ads
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced plans to increase enforcement on pharmaceutical ads and closing loopholes on side effect disclosures.

title: Trump announces Princeton student released by Iran-backed militia
shortDescription: Elizabeth Tsurkov, a Princeton graduate student held hostage in Iraq, has been freed by the Iranian militia Kataib Hezbollah, President Trump said.
